item.description:
Going Social: Making Business Sense of Social Media Opportunities

There are so many cool tools of social media – Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Linked-in, FastPitch, blogging, and more. But does having a social presence really add to your business or do they just subtract from your time? As creative communicators, we can’t ignore the tools. But how much time and effort should you put in to using them? Is success measured by how many friends and followers you have? Mary Ann and Kyle Dostaler from MAD Communications and Laura Tedeschi of T2 Creative will present a case study of how they worked with their client, The Latimer Group, to make business sense of social media opportunities.

Reserve Your Place: 2 steps
- Go to: www.paypal.com and select the "Send Money" tab
- Insert "kolkdesign@usa.net" in "Recipient's Email".
- Type in the amount you wish to send. ($24 per person)
- Select "Service" for "Type" (of money sent).
- Put ICC meeting-November 19 in the "Subject" box.
- Note: Use the PayPal message box to type in your meal preference. This time our meal choices are: Potato-Crusted Basa Sole, Chicken Caprice or Veggie Stir-Fry.
- Don't forget to RSVP at the meetup.com site also!

OUR RESERVATION DEADLINE is Friday, November 13.
To cancel your reservation, you must do so by 5pm November 13 or your payment will be forfeited.

group.name: Independent Creative Club of Greater Hartford

item.name: Don't Forget to Sign up for ICC by Friday: Going Social
